Message:
Those two are kind,
so I’m sure they’d forgive me.

Actually...if I dodge their
questions well, I can probably
cover up all my faults.

But if I do that, I’ll really
never be able to face those two.

So I looked away from
the letter—from her gaze...
I know that all this is meaningless.

Because looking away and
locking up my emotions
can’t make things disappear.
